author: stefanbratanov
content: Hi, got a question  about https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/eip4844/p2p-interface.md#blobssidecarsbyrange-v1 It says `Peers that are unable to reply to blobs sidecars requests within the MIN_EPOCHS_FOR_BLOBS_SIDECARS_REQUESTS epoch range SHOULD respond with error code 3: ResourceUnavailable.` So, on every request it should be checked that all sidecars within the `MIN_EPOCHS_FOR_BLOBS_SIDECARS_REQUESTS` range are available, regardless of what range is actually requested?
